page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Our block is mostly farmland.The White Cart Water runs through it.The main settlement is the village of Eaglesham with two outlying hamlets _Millhall and Jackton.The land slopes up towards the top of the village_ altitude 210m. Eaglesham has a population of 3163,and lies 10 miles from Glasgow and 5 miles from the new town of East Kilbride.The farms round about are mainly dairy farms.Eaglesham is now a dormitory with no industry.The only employment is in shops or farm work.Most people work in Glasgow and many are representatives and therefore mobile. Eaglesham is still growing.There has been a great deal of new building in the private sector and an influx of new people with a goodly number of professionals and executives.Our rainfall is 1428mm stored in a reservoir and filter station.
